acls-import.name: xdmod-public-user
acls-import.description: Imports the Public User if it does not already exist.

acls-import.name: xdmod-user-acls
acls-import.description: Imports the records that relate which Users should have which Acls for xdmod

acls-import.name: xdmod-user-acl-group-by-parameters
acls-import.description: Imports the records which denote a value to use for a particular User / Acl / Group By combination for xdmod

acls-import.name: xdmod-user-acl-group-by-parameters-sync
acls-import.description: Syncs current user_acl_group_by_parameters records w/ all 'provider' group_bys

acls-import.name: xdmod-scrub-acl-tabs
acls-import.description: Ensures that the acl_tabs table does not contain erroneous data

acls-import.name: xdmod-update-admin-users
acls-import.description: Ensure that any users that only have 'mgr' have 'usr' added.

acls-import.name: xdmod-clear-orphan-parameter-records
acls-import.description: Ensure that any orphan parameter records are removed.
